h1_title: Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough
h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - "Tiger Vanguard" (Kingdom of Sahali)
content: One powerful (yet deflectable) attack he can also employ has a long wind up as he’ll drag his sword slowly along the ground, building up friction and sparks as he drags it to you before ripping the blade up. Rock Solid can stop the attack but won’t always stagger him, but it’s easier to see coming than other moves.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2_Secret-Kingdom_of_Sahali_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - "Tiger Vanguard" (Kingdom of Sahali)'.
The content is as follows:
One powerful (yet deflectable) attack he can also employ has a long wind up as he’ll drag his sword slowly along the ground, building up friction and sparks as he drags it to you before ripping the blade up. Rock Solid can stop the attack but won’t always stagger him, but it’s easier to see coming than other moves.
